tip1.title: About Gartic Phone
tip1.article: Gartic Telephone is an online game that mixes Pictionary with the Telephone game (the game where you whisper into the next persons ear all the way round the group and compare the original phrase to what was whispered). This game is the visual version of that: where you draw what you see, and guess what you saw! Play alternates between drawing a word/phrase and guessing what those drawings are depicting.

tip2.title: What Makes a Gartic Phone Game Fun
tip2.article: Gartic Phone reviews here at Geek include the ubiquitous fun phrase, but its a pretty meaningless term. The fact of the matter is that just about every smartphone game is fun. When you throw in your own creativity, you take the fun to the next level. You should find a quick introduction to the basic principles of Gartic Phone by reading these Gartic Phone guides. When youre ready to get started, youll need an internet connection and your own device to play. Here are all the free game pages I recommend for Gartic Phone.

tip3.title: How to Find the Best Deals on a Gartic Phone
tip3.article: The Best Free Internet Browser Games for the iPhone iiPhonee users have one particular niche in the market when it comes to web browser games. Google Chrome and Safari have been around for a while and now they have introduced an impressive list of amazing games. While some, like Angry Birds Rio and Clash of Clans, have been around for quite some time, others, like NaturalMotions SpatialOS system or Gwent from CD Projekt Red, were only introduced this year.
